messages.message:
Below is the response from the model. Since we don't support download, we should not show the link for download. For response summary, @tamir can you enable email tool under the internal preview features (https://aihub.instabase.com/settings/account) - "Enable email tool for agents"

`"Here is the information in a .docx file format:

---

**Document Name:** paystub_1493826763064.PDF

**Summary:** This document is a Military Leave and Earnings Statement for George Bryan Cox, covering the period from 1-30 September 2016. It details his entitlements, deductions, allotments, and provides a summary of his pay, leave balance, and tax information.

---

You can download the .docx file from the link below:

[Document Summary](sandbox:/mnt/data/Document_Summary.docx)"`

@jordy.vlan I believe we should handle this at model end

This looks like the model is hallucinating and providing a dummy URL. This doesn't happen with multistep models though. Only the single doc pipeline is having this issue. Maybe that pipeline needs a prompt update.
